item.title: Bayes Theorem
item.description: Bayes’ theorem is used to describe the probability of an event based on the prior knowledge of conditions that might be related to the event.

item.title: Bayesian Decision Theory
item.description: It is a fundamental statistical approach to the problem of pattern classification. It predicts the outcome not only based on previous observations but also by taking into account the current situation.
